Minhyuk!

Hope you like it!

Hiii could I get a private selca ship with bts, nct, seventeen, exo, and monsta x? Thank you so much!

blog.name: fuckyeahgoodomens
blog.title: Fuck Yeah Good Omens
blog.description: Funniest apocalypse ever!

summary: 'Good Omens' Costume Designer Reveals How Keith Richards Influenced Amazon Miniseries' Looks
title: 'Good Omens' Costume Designer Reveals How Keith Richards Influenced Amazon Miniseries' Looks
excerpt: Claire Anderson conjured rock-star style for Michael  Sheen, David Tennant and Jon  Hamm, who play angels and devils in the apocalyptic comedy.
description:
With 40-plus periods — including the Crucifixion and World War II — “angelness and demon-ness” needed to cross all timelines, says Anderson. Sheen’s ether-eal waistcoat suited Victorian England and modern London alike, with the British designer taking cues from “Pre-Raphaelite paintings … because religion was so fervently strong in that era.” Gold threads in a bow tie or a shirt dyed pale blue added “serenity and warmth,” she says.

For Crowley’s demonic look, Anderson referenced rocker styles. “David moves like Keith Richards did in the ‘60s,” says Anderson, who designed textured jackets with big lapels that “allow[ed] his shirt fabric to tumble when open.” Anderson also painted snakeskin shoes black with red around the soles to mimic the “red banding of the snake in the Garden of Eden.”

Perhaps the most impeccably dressed was Jon Hamm’s head angel Gabriel. “We went to the Italian label Zegna on Bond Street, as I wanted the softness of cashmere for his character,” says Anderson. “He looked wonderful in a tailored pearl gray suit with a hint of lilac. We gave him lilac contact lenses to bring out the coat and the violet in his eyes.” It would seem that God and the devil are in the details.

Sheen’s ether-eal waistcoat suited Victorian England and modern London alike, with the British designer taking cues from “Pre-Raphaelite paintings … because religion was so fervently strong in that era.” Gold threads in a bow tie or a shirt dyed pale blue added “serenity and warmth,” she says.

For Crowley’s demonic look, Anderson referenced rocker styles. “David moves like Keith Richards did in the ‘60s,” says Anderson, who designed textured jackets with big lapels that “allow[ed] his shirt fabric to tumble when open.” Anderson also painted snakeskin shoes black with red around the soles to mimic the “red banding of the snake in the Garden of Eden.”

Perhaps the most impeccably dressed was Jon Hamm’s head angel Gabriel. “We went to the Italian label Zegna on Bond Street, as I wanted the softness of cashmere for his character,” says Anderson. “He looked wonderful in a tailored pearl gray suit with a hint of lilac. We gave him lilac contact lenses to bring out the coat and the violet in his eyes.” It would seem that God and the devil are in the details.

Sheen’s ether-eal waistcoat suited Victorian England and modern London alike, with the British designer taking cues from “Pre-Raphaelite paintings … because religion was so fervently strong in that era.” Gold threads in a bow tie or a shirt dyed pale blue added “serenity and warmth,” she says.

For Crowley’s demonic look, Anderson referenced rocker styles. “David moves like Keith Richards did in the ‘60s,” says Anderson, who designed textured jackets with big lapels that “allow[ed] his shirt fabric to tumble when open.” Anderson also painted snakeskin shoes black with red around the soles to mimic the “red banding of the snake in the Garden of Eden.”

Perhaps the most impeccably dressed was Jon Hamm’s head angel Gabriel. “We went to the Italian label Zegna on Bond Street, as I wanted the softness of cashmere for his character,” says Anderson. “He looked wonderful in a tailored pearl gray suit with a hint of lilac. We gave him lilac contact lenses to bring out the coat and the violet in his eyes.” It would seem that God and the devil are in the details.
trail.content:

Sheen’s ether-eal waistcoat suited Victorian England and modern London alike, with the British designer taking cues from “Pre-Raphaelite paintings … because religion was so fervently strong in that era.” Gold threads in a bow tie or a shirt dyed pale blue added “serenity and warmth,” she says.

For Crowley’s demonic look, Anderson referenced rocker styles. “David moves like Keith Richards did in the ‘60s,” says Anderson, who designed textured jackets with big lapels that “allow[ed] his shirt fabric to tumble when open.” Anderson also painted snakeskin shoes black with red around the soles to mimic the “red banding of the snake in the Garden of Eden.”

Perhaps the most impeccably dressed was Jon Hamm’s head angel Gabriel. “We went to the Italian label Zegna on Bond Street, as I wanted the softness of cashmere for his character,” says Anderson. “He looked wonderful in a tailored pearl gray suit with a hint of lilac. We gave him lilac contact lenses to bring out the coat and the violet in his eyes.” It would seem that God and the devil are in the details.

blog.description: B&w photos of BTS and gifs made or edited by me 🖤💜

summary: So today run BTS behind was interesting... up here☝🏻 we’ve got sope. Yoongi is feeling himself... duh and he should 👌 and Hoseok...
body:
So today run BTS behind was interesting… up here☝🏻 we’ve got sope. Yoongi is feeling himself… duh and he should 👌 and Hoseok dancing on the floor like crazy and I love it too 💜twerkin or just shakin

Then we’ve got Jin with Jimin’s shoe 👞 maybe smelly 🥴 who knows 🤷🏻‍♀️💜 and he’s giving it to Yoongi for CPR 🤣 I can’t with them 🙄💜

And of course our Golden Maknae 💁🏻 who’s telling us lies that he can’t do it and eventually he’s doing it so yep 👍 oh and bonus is Jimin ‘DYING’ he is an amazing actor 👏🏼💜

summary: What do you prefer when reading fics
body:
What do you prefer when reading fics

The writers point of view: using terms like I and me

The readers point of view: using terms like you and doing a name insert, either as y/n or ____

Reading a third POV: terms like he, she, and they

blog.name: jisungiebebe
blog.title: jordie
blog.description: multifandom

summary:
brighter • a social media au
part 5: stoning?!
In which Y/N is a young history of arts student, part-time model, that every year...
body:
brighter • a social media au

part 5: stoning?!

In which Y/N is a young history of arts student, part-time model, that every year spends her holidays with her squad in a small village in the mountains. Kim Seokjin is the most famous idol in the world and he used to come to the village too before becoming a global superstar. It has been 6 years since he visited and he suddenly came back shutting the world out. How will Y/N act around her favourite idol and long time crush?

warnings: swearing, c/h

<prev masterlist next>

@pwinny00 @live-2-fangirl @rinemoon @lilliaflurr

blog.name: ao3feed-namseok
blog.title: 94z
blog.description: This blog is an AUTOMATED blog that uses an IFTTT algorithm to instantly post fics posted under the relationship: Jung Hoseok | J-Hope/Kim Namjoon | RM tag on ao3. The owner of this blog (hoseokie-jung) only logs in to delete things that don't belong (rp requests, other ships, etc) once every couple of months because she has a terrible memory and forgets that this is, in fact, her blog.

title: i like you.
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2EnAccf

by otterseoks

namjoon likes to go on long walks and talk about whatever is on his mind with hoseok.

or maybe he just likes hoseok.

summary:
[𝗦𝗖𝗔𝗡] 𝗕𝗧𝗦 𝗪𝗼𝗿𝗹𝗱 𝗧𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝕃𝕠𝕧𝕖 𝕐𝕠𝕦𝕣𝕤𝕖𝕝𝕗 𝐍𝐞𝐰 𝐘𝐨𝐫𝐤

| 𝗬𝗼𝗼𝗻𝗴𝗶  Do not remove watermark | Editing allowed with credit

tags: why am i so in love with him
summary: It’s just one scar on one cheek. How in the world can it have me screaming like this? He’s just so beautiful I could cry....
body: It’s just one scar on one cheek. How in the world can it have me screaming like this? He’s just so beautiful I could cry. Honestly so unfair
